notes.text: We've resolved an issue where links in the Table building block within a custom section did not work correctly in object pages
We now ensure that values of fields with a static '%' unit are displayed correctly
We now provide tooltips for all filter fields in the filter bar using the QuickInfo annotation
We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField
We now ensure that side effects are executed before updating a document in an object page
